Uses of RoutingTable in pgrid.core
 

Subclasses of RoutingTable in pgrid.core
 class LocalRoutingTable
          This class represents the Routing Table of the P-Grid facility.
 class XMLRoutingTable
          This class extends the RoutingTable with XML functionality.
 

Methods in pgrid.core with parameters of type RoutingTable
 void RoutingTable.refresh(RoutingTable routingTable, int commonLen, int lLen, int rLen, int maxFidgets, int maxRef)
          Refreshes the routing table by building the union with the given routing table.
 void RoutingTable.union(RoutingTable routingTable)
          Performs a union of the delivered and this Routing Table.
 void LocalRoutingTable.union(RoutingTable routingTable)
          Performs a union of the delivered and this Routing Table.
 void RoutingTable.unionFidgets(RoutingTable routingTable)
          Performs a union of the Fidget hosts of the delivered and this Routing Table.
 void RoutingTable.unionLevel(int level, RoutingTable routingTable)
          Performs a union of the hosts at the delivered level of the delivered and this Routing Table.
 void LocalRoutingTable.unionLevel(int level, RoutingTable routingTable)
          Performs a union of the hosts at the delivered level of the delivered and this Routing Table.
